addu $r7, $0, $0
000000  00000 00000 00111 00000 100001
addi $r1, $0, 10
001000 00000 00001 0000000000001010
addi $r2, $0, 13
001000 00000 00010 0000000000001101
mul $r3, $r1, $r1
000000 00001 00001 00011 00000 011000
j Jump
000010 00000000000000000000010111

bubble:
li $t0, 10
001111 00000 00111 0000000000001010
li $t1, 4
001111 00000 00001 0000000000000100
mul $t4, $t0, $t1
000000 00111 00001 00100 00000 011000

outer:
addi $r6, $0, 8
001000 00000 00110 0000000000001000
subu $r7, $r4, $r6
000000 00100 00110 00111 00000 100011
li $r1, 0
001111 00000 00001 0000000000000000

inner:
lw $r2, 4($r7)
100011 00111 00010 0000000000000100
lw $r3, 0($r7)
100011 00111 00011 0000000000000000
ble $t2,$t3,no_swap
000110 00010 00011 0000000000000011
sw $t2, 0($t0)
101011 00111 00010 0000000000000000
sw $t3, 4($t0)
101011 00111 00011 0000000000000100
li $t1, 1
001111 00000 00001 0000000000000001

no_swap:
addi $t5, $0, 4
001000 00000 00101 0000000000000100
subu $t0, $t0, $t5
000000 00111 00101 00111 00000 100011
bltz $t0, next_turn
000001 00111 00000 0000000000000001
j inner
000010 00000000000000000000001011

next_turn:
bnez $t1, outer
000101 00001 00000 1111111111110010
j End
000010 00000000000000000000011011

Jump:
subu $r2, $r2, $r1
000000 00010 00001 00010 00000 100011

Loop:
addu $r4, $r3, $r2
000000 00011 00010 00100 00000 100001
beq $r1, $r2, Loop
000100 00001 00010 1111111111111110
j bubble
000010 00000000000000000000000101

End:
